page.title: 17Fairs & Events.
page.content: { Netherthorpe School Garden Party.} This takes place every year in July and is usually very popular. It has a wide variety of stalls and games.{ { Saturday Football League.}This takes place in Poolsbrook sports ground where teams come and battle it out. Many of the players are miners. { Parade.}This takes place in August and goes from Netherthorpe bus park to Speedwell Fields where there is a fair and some stunt men. There are also motorised model planes. { Staveley Festival.}Although this takes place just outside the area many people from Netherthorpe, Duckmanton and Poolsbrook take part. { Woodthorpe Fate.}This takes place every year in aid of the Church of England. By STEVEN CLARKE & BRUCE HILL.
